original_text: If God agrees, I will then be able to come to you, and we will be happy together. I will enjoy having some rest while I stay there with you. If God agrees, I will then be able to come to you, and we will be happy together. I will enjoy having some rest while I stay there with you. If God agrees, I will then be able to come to you, and we will be happy together. I will enjoy having some rest while I stay there with you. If God agrees, I will then be able to come to you, and we will be happy together. I will enjoy having some rest while I stay there with you.
korean_text: 나로 하나님의 뜻을 따라 기쁨으로 너희에게 나아가 너희와 함께 편히 쉬게 하라

sentences.original_text: If God agrees
I will then be able to come to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 당신에게 갈 수 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and we will be happy together
I will enjoy having some rest
while I stay there with you
